1:
Be merciful to me, God, for men are attacking me!\q All the day long those who fight me press their assault.
\q
2:
My enemies trample me all day long;\q for there are many who arrogantly fight against me.


\q
3:
When I am afraid,\q I will put my trust in you.
\q
5:
All the day long they twist my words;\q all their thoughts are against me for evil.
\q
6:
They gather themselves together, they hide themselves,\q and they mark my steps,
\q just as they have waited for my life.


\q
7:
Do not let them escape doing iniquity.\q Bring down the peoples in your anger, God.
\q
9:
Then my enemies will turn back on the day that I call to you;\q this I know, that God is for me.
\q
10: In God—whose word I praise,\q in Yahweh—whose word I praise,
11:
in God I trust,\q I will not be afraid.
\q What can anyone do to me?


\q
12:
The duty to fulfill my vows to you is on me, God;\q I will give thank offerings to you.
\q
13:
For you have rescued my life from death;\q you have kept my feet from falling,
\q so that I may walk before God
\q in the light of the living.
